description: Added CREATE_PLOT_CODE function to generate Python plotting code with embedded sensor data
changes: Added new CREATE_PLOT_CODE custom function that fetches sensor data and returns Python plotting code as text
Function supports customizable plot parameters: height, aspect ratio, colors, styles, opacity, and labels
Implements three plot styles: normal, minimal, and sparkline with appropriate formatting
Defaults to 100 data points for optimal performance
Generated Python code includes embedded sensor data and complete matplotlib plotting logic
Supports all existing datetime formats and timezone handling from PULL function
Updated function documentation with usage examples and parameter descriptions
